boardgame.name: Xia: Legends of a Drift System
Xia: Leyendas de un sistema a la deriva
Ксиа. Тайны дрейфующей системы
boardgame.description: Xia: Legends of a Drift System is a 3-5 player sandbox style competitive space adventure. Each player starts as a lowly but hopeful captain of a small starship._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players fly their ships about the system, completing a variety of missions, exploring new sectors and battling other ships. Navigating hazardous environments, players choose to mine, salvage, or trade valuable cargo. Captains vie with each other for Titles, riches, and most importantly Fame._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The most adaptive, risk taking, and creative players will excel. One captain will rise above the others, surpassing mortality by becoming Legend!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Customize: Each player begins the game by choosing and customizing a Tier 1 starship. Invest all your money in engines and be a rapid, yet fragile, explorer. Put all your credits into an uber missile and watch other players flee in terror. Get a small engine and save space and credits to invest in buying and selling cargo. Or create a well rounded ship, ready for anything. In Xia, the choice is always yours._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Adapt: The goal of Xia is to become the most famous captain. Completing missions, besting ships in combat, purchasing higher tier ships, selling Cargo Cubes and claiming Titles are all ways that players can earn Fame Points. The best pilots will adapt to their surroundings, making snap judgments and changing plans on-the-fly. If you can think on your feet, you'll do well in Xia!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sandbox: The real fun of Xia is that each game will be different. There is no set direction of play, players may choose to be peaceful traders, fierce pirates, workers, miners, opportunists, etc. The game board is randomly laid out and explored each time you play. Players might choose not to explore at all, creating a tiny arena for swift and deadly combat, or explore all 19 sectors and have a large play-scape to exploit. It's up to you!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Modding: Xia is very opened to modding, and the community created loads of stuff. See BGG's Unofficial Xia:LoaDS mods and expansions wiki._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I need money so you´ve got the chance to get a brand new - still shrink wrapped KS - Edition of the game incl. the Sellsword ship !!! A precious gem for every board game collection incl. 40 metal coins, 22 pre painted plastic ships ( yepp - KS exclusive add-on Sellsword is included ) and the KS exclusive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;8 new mission cards of a new mission type - Envoy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. *** Shipment: I´m packing with greatest care to ensure that your games arrive in perfect condition. International shipping rates (DHL, all prices in Euro): Letter (up to 0,5 kg): 3,45 € worldwide Letter (up to 1,0 kg): 7,00 € worldwide Letter (up to 2,0 kg): 17,00 € worldwide +++ inscribed letter: add 2,05 € = insured till 20,00 € or insribed letter: add 3,85 € = insured till 25,00 or extra insurence: add 1,50 € für every 100,00 € insurance. Small Parcel (up to 2,0 kg): 8,90 € (EU) or 15,90 € (worldwide) +++ no full insurence possible (only up to 35 Euro for additional 2,00 €) Parcel (up to 5,0 kg): 16,99 € (EU) or 29,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 35,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 42,99 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 10,0 kg): 21,99 € (EU) or 34,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 47,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 59,99 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 20,0 kg): 31,99 € (EU) or 49,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 68,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 92,99 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 31,5 kg): 41,99 € (EU) or 54,99 € (Rest of Europe) or 93,99 € (USA/CAN) oder 124,99 € (Rest of World) Insured till 500,00 € only in EU +++ add 8,50 € for insurance (Rest of Europe) or 18 € (USA/CAN) or 24 € (Rest of World) Shipping in Germany (DHL, all prices in Euro): Brief (up to 0,05 kg): 0,90 € Großbrief (up to 0,5 kg): 1,45 € Warensendung (up to 0,5 kg): 1,90 € Maxibrief (up to 1,0 kg): 2,40 € Maxibrief (up to 2,0 kg): 4,60 € +++ inscribed letter: add 2,05 € = insured till 20,00 € or insribed letter: add 3,85 € = insured till 25,00 or extra insurence: add 1,50 € für every 100,00 € insurance. Päckchen (up to 2,0 kg): 4,10 € +++ no insurence possible Paket (up to 2,0 kg): 4,99 € Paket (up to 10,0 kg): 6,99 € Paket (up to 20,0 kg): 11,99 € Paket (up to 31,5 kg): 13,99 € Insured till 500,00 € NO ADDITIONAL FEES FOR PACKAGE! *** Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Paypal -fees are 0,35 Euro + (3,9% - 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. The fees of the payment method you choose and the real shipping costs you have to pay. Thank you. Stephan.

The only blemish, is I did carry the rulebook around in my bag for a bit and it got a little bent / etc. Everything else is exactly how it arrived to me, and looks good from what I can tell! I am only asking for exactly what I paid ($100) plus $15 towards shipping in the US, as this is a Big box! PM me, as I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t see this deal lasting for long since it is lower than all the others listed here or on ebay :)

Components - Retail Edition (FOG 1700): 96 Cards, Divided As Follows: 52 Mission Cards 18 Ability Cards (1 for each Player Ship) 18 Title Cards 5 How To Win Cards 3 NPC Cards 84 Outfits (7 each of the 3 Tiers for each Outfit type: Blaster, Engine, Missile and Shield) 80 Orange Damage Markers 75 Cargo Cubes (15 of each color) 40 Metal Credit Tokens (30 Silver 1,000 cR Tokens, 10 Blue 5,000 cR Tokens) 30 Colored Wooden Markers (6 of each player color) 21 Sector Tiles (3 Asteroid, 3 Debris, 3 Gate, 3 Nebulae, 7 Planets, 1 Star, 1 Void) 21 Exploration Tokens 18 Player Miniatures _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Flight Stands (6 Tier I, 6 Tier II, 6 Tier III) 18 Ship Mats (1 for each Player Ship) 7 Outlaw Tokens 5 Impulse Tokens 4 Dice (1 each of d6, d8, d12, and d20) 3 NPC Miniatures _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Flight Stands 1 Rulebook 1 Matte-Black Box Insert 1 Clear, removable Box Insert 1 Replication Token 1 Fame Point Track 1 Victory Marker Additional Components - Kickstarter Edition (FOG 1701): 8 Envoy Mission Cards 1 Envoy Mission Rules Card Note: This edition of the game (FOG 1701) has a total card count of 105.

Xia: Legends of a Drift System is a 3-5 player sandbox style competitive space adventure. Each player starts as a lowly but hopeful captain of a small starship. Players fly their ships about the system, completing a variety of missions, exploring new sectors and battling other ships. Navigating hazardous environments, players choose to mine, salvage, or trade valuable cargo. Captains vie with each other for Titles, riches, and most importantly Fame. The most adaptive, risk taking, and creative players will excel. One captain will rise above the others, surpassing mortality by becoming Legend!
